INDIGODevice¶

class INDIGO_Client.INDIGODevice(name, server)[source]¶

This is a class representation of a device in the INDIGO protocol.

Variables:
  • name – Name of the device.
  • server – Instance of the server.
  • properties – List of all properties that are part of the current device.
_parseDelTag(tag)[source]¶

Here, we delete the property upon receiving a delProperty message from the server.

Parameters:tag (xml.etree.ElementTree.Element) – Element of the parser of XML message.
_parseVectorTag(tag)[source]¶

Here we create the new elements by instantiating an INDIGOProperty and calling its _parserVectorTag method.

Parameters:tag (xml.etree.ElementTree.Element) – Element of the parser of XML message.
